name: Sealess Mother
description:
Sealess Mother is a harsh dive into a horror story of seemingly uncertain contours. 

But your personal experience is of the utmost importance. 

So, there's no need to let you know any more before playing this game. 

If you like weird experiences with strong horror undertones, then Sealess Mother is the game for you.

Minimum system requirements:

  • O.S.: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • CPU: Pentium® III 800 MHz or higher
  • Screen resolution: 1280x720
  • Free hdd space: 265 MB
  • Free ram space: 512 MB
  • GPU memory: 128 MB
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 8.0 or higher

When downloading, consider a donation to support the developer. Thank you! ❤️ 

For questions, help, and support, feel free to contact me on twitter (@evonture), or on the Discord server linked below.

Official Discord
